org.datavec.image.transform

Class ScaleImageTransform

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.datavec.image.transform.BaseImageTransform<org.bytedeco.javacpp.opencv_core.Mat>
      • org.datavec.image.transform.ScaleImageTransform
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ImageTransform

    public class ScaleImageTransform
extends BaseImageTransform<org.bytedeco.javacpp.opencv_core.Mat>
    ScaleImageTransform is aim to scale by a certain random factor, not the final size of the image.

        Parameters:
        random - object to use (or null for deterministic)
        dx - maximum scaling in width of the image (pixels)
        dy - maximum scaling in height of the image (pixels)
